creator: TheOneEyedHobo
title: USB Powered Desk Fan From JUNK
description: This project describes how to build a small desk fan powered by USB, using easily obtainable or junk parts. It serves as a good introductory project for USB and soldering techniques.
steps: Gather all the necessary materials, including a small motor, fan blades, a USB cable, and a suitable case.
Prepare the USB cable by cutting it, stripping the outer insulation, and isolating the red and black wires. Strip the ends of these wires.
Prepare the case by modifying it to accommodate the motor and USB cable. Thread the USB cable through the case.
Determine the correct polarity for the motor by temporarily attaching the fan blades and testing the direction of airflow. Solder the USB wires to the motor wires accordingly.
Securely attach the motor to the case using a hot glue gun or other adhesive.
Attach the fan blades to the motor shaft and plug in the USB cable to test the fan.
